column4: anyone know if its possible to write to a mounted iso, I dont want to recreate the iso just add a few files without modifying the boot sector and info that the iso already has
you need something like uck and it would require a remaster of the iso (burning a new iso)
thanks but the iso is not linux its another OS
well does not really matter what distro--they all have an iteration of it--fedora has constructor or somesuch which distro was it--you can then ask in their channel--trivially easy really
